Docs.typeparam: The class defining which columns to take from the incoming data.
The class defining which new columns are added to the data.
Docs.param: The mapping action. This must be thread-safe and free from side effects.
The contract name, used by ML.NET for loading the model. If null is specified, such a trained model would not be save-able.
Additional parameters for schema mapping between and input data.
Additional parameters for schema mapping between and output data.
Docs.summary: Create a custom mapping of input columns to output columns.
